title: What It Feels like to be a Ghost
description: Ever since a familiar face from her past entered her new life, twenty-four-year-old Ivy Allan has been haunted by the person she used to be. Zeke knows Ivy as Annabel, a seventeen-year-old girl who was believed to be dead. With Zeke in close proximity to everyone she now cares about, Ivy fears her biggest secret is no longer safe. As she struggles to keep it, she becomes entangled in the question of who she is and who she wants to be in the midst of being pulled between two separate lives.
author: Heather Gean
